overview: Nachiketha meets rigveda in an accident and falls in love. Rigveda,who doesnt believe in love, wants to escape from this nuisance and also teach him a lesson at the same time, So she tells nachiketha that she will love him back if he can speak in pure telugu with everyone for the next 15 days.Will he be able to pass this test?
title: Oka Telugu Prema Katha
